channels.name: his_to_lis

data.label: Visual Groovy Code

expressions.name: Terser set

channels.last_deployed_route:
<routes xmlns="http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring"><route id="8bafebc5-296c-49df-ac4c-7470bb1d88a0" group="his_demo"><description>TCP/MLLP Input</description>
    <from uri="mllp://0.0.0.0:9001?acceptTimeout%3D60000%26autoAck%3Dtrue%26backlog%3D5%26keepAlive%3Dtrue%26requireEndOfData%3Dtrue%26stringPayload%3Dtrue%26validatePayload%3Dfalse"/>
    <unmarshal><hl7/></unmarshal>
    <to uri="direct:588a6459-e0c7-4115-b8c1-9a92fa0a8fdc" />
</route><route id="313bc5b5-2867-4598-b3ed-683d6150293d" group=""><description>File Output</description>
    <from uri="direct:313bc5b5-2867-4598-b3ed-683d6150293d"/>
    <to uri="file:///Users/hernaj34/projects/_events/demo_dh_tools/exchanges?allowNullBody%3Dfalse%26bufferSize%3D131072%26fileExist%3DOverride"/>
    <to uri="direct:a910e07a-ea8e-41f7-baf5-5b871233f65f" />
</route><route id="a910e07a-ea8e-41f7-baf5-5b871233f65f" group="lis_demo"><description>Fin Flujo</description>
    <from uri="direct:a910e07a-ea8e-41f7-baf5-5b871233f65f"/>
    
    
    <to uri="mock:enda910e07a-ea8e-41f7-baf5-5b871233f65f"/>
</route><route id="18c87a37-7481-49ed-920b-d2020e3f8837" group=""><description>Visual Groovy Code</description>
    <from uri="direct:18c87a37-7481-49ed-920b-d2020e3f8837"/>
    <script>
        <groovy>
            <![CDATA[import com.github.mustachejava.DefaultMustacheFactory;
import com.github.mustachejava.Mustache;
import java.io.StringReader;
import java.io.StringWriter;
import java.io.Writer;
import ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Message;
import ca.uhn.hl7v2.util.Terser;

// Code preparation
def context = [exchange: exchange, request: request, response: response, properties: properties, variables: [:]];
def nestedSet( variables, variablePath, Object value){
    def index = 0
    def currentVariable = variables
    for (member in variablePath){
        if (index == variablePath.size() - 1) {
            currentVariable[member] = value
        }else{
            if (!currentVariable.containsKey(member)){
                currentVariable[member] = [:]
            }
            currentVariable = currentVariable[member]
        }
        index++
    }
}

def resolveTemplate(String template, Object context){
    Writer writer = new StringWriter();
    DefaultMustacheFactory mf = new DefaultMustacheFactory();
    mf.compile(new StringReader(template),"test","#{","}").execute(writer,context);
    return writer.toString();
}

// Functions

def any_setter(self, options) {
    context = options.context;
    params = options.params;
    variablePath = options.variablePath;
    nestedSet(context.variables, variablePath, params.value);
}

def requestGetBody(self, options) {
    context = options.context;
    params = options.params;
    variablePath = options.variablePath;
    return self.getBody(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Message.class);
}

def hl7TerserSet(self, options) {
    context = options.context;
    params = options.params;
    variablePath = options.variablePath;
    Terser terser = new Terser(self);
    params.path = resolveTemplate(params.path, context);
    params.value = resolveTemplate(params.value, context);
    terser.set(params.path,params.value);
}

def exchangeSetBody(self, options) {
    context = options.context;
    params = options.params;
    variablePath = options.variablePath;
    self.getIn().setBody(params.body);
}

def hl7Encode(self, options) {
    context = options.context;
    params = options.params;
    variablePath = options.variablePath;
    return self.encode();
}

// Start

// Nuevo grupo de expresiones
any_setter(context?.variables?.hl7, [ params: ["value": requestGetBody(context?.request, [ params: [:], context: context])], variablePath: ["hl7"], context: context]);
hl7TerserSet(context?.variables?.hl7, [ params: ["path": "/.MSH-3-1", "value": "ORIGIN_MODIFIED"], variablePath: ["hl7"], context: context]);
exchangeSetBody(context?.exchange, [ params: ["body": hl7Encode(context?.variables?.hl7, [ params: [:], variablePath: ["hl7"], context: context])], context: context]);

// End]]>
        </groovy>
    </script>
    <to uri="direct:313bc5b5-2867-4598-b3ed-683d6150293d" />
</route><route id="588a6459-e0c7-4115-b8c1-9a92fa0a8fdc" group=""><description>Identificar Entidad</description>
    <from uri="direct:588a6459-e0c7-4115-b8c1-9a92fa0a8fdc"/>
        <setHeader name="entity_id"><hl7terser>/.ORC-2</hl7terser></setHeader>
<setHeader name="message_id"><hl7terser>/.MSH-10</hl7terser></setHeader>
<setHeader name="message_type"><hl7terser>/.MSH-9-1</hl7terser></setHeader>
    <to uri="direct:f3091fcf-d71d-4ab7-a696-fe78df7d9517" />
</route><route id="f3091fcf-d71d-4ab7-a696-fe78df7d9517" group=""><description>Wire Tap</description>
    <from uri="direct:f3091fcf-d71d-4ab7-a696-fe78df7d9517"/>
        <wireTap uri="direct:f1f72556-08af-407c-9957-c242d08ec56b"/>
    <to uri="direct:18c87a37-7481-49ed-920b-d2020e3f8837" />
    
    <to uri="mock:ending"/>
</route><route id="f1f72556-08af-407c-9957-c242d08ec56b" group=""><description>Crear Entidad</description>
    <from uri="direct:f1f72556-08af-407c-9957-c242d08ec56b"/>
        
            <setHeader name="organization"><constant>994e852b-80d0-4382-8f6f-3a60036633ce</constant></setHeader>
            <choice>
                <when>
                            <simple>${headers.message_type} == "ORM"</simple>
                            <setHeader name="entity_type"><constant>order</constant></setHeader>
                            <setBody><simple>{}</simple></setBody>
                        </when>
                <otherwise>
                    <setHeader name="entity_type"><constant>unknown</constant></setHeader>
                    <setBody><simple>{}</simple></setBody>
                </otherwise>
            </choice>
            <unmarshal><json/></unmarshal>
            <process ref="entityGenerator"/>
            <to uri="mock:store"/>
        
    <to uri="log:entity_creation"/>
</route></routes>

channels.last_deployed_route:
<routes xmlns="http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring"><route id="7d17ad14-f46c-4198-b765-252902eec253" group="lis_demo"><description>HTTP Input</description>
    <from uri="jetty:http://0.0.0.0:8888/send_results?async%3Dfalse%26enableCORS%3Dfalse"/>
    
        <unmarshal><json/></unmarshal>    <to uri="direct:ace30340-6eec-47cc-861e-8cfe958987f4" />
</route><route id="ace30340-6eec-47cc-861e-8cfe958987f4" group=""><description>Identificar Entidad</description>
    <from uri="direct:ace30340-6eec-47cc-861e-8cfe958987f4"/>
        <setHeader name="entity_id"><simple>${body['entity']}</simple></setHeader>
<setHeader name="message_id"><simple>${body['id']}</simple></setHeader>
<setHeader name="message_type"><simple>${body['type']}</simple></setHeader>
    <to uri="direct:3a765275-15dc-4046-b199-8e8343921c8a" />
</route><route id="255377ac-d502-475a-b820-1c921fb39d12" group="his_demo"><description>Fin Flujo</description>

    <to uri="mock:end255377ac-d502-475a-b820-1c921fb39d12"/>
</route><route id="f69bf69e-66a4-4570-b6cd-1b3241ea4f07" group=""><description>Crear Entidad</description>

            <setHeader name="organization"><constant>994e852b-80d0-4382-8f6f-3a60036633ce</constant></setHeader>
            <choice>
                <when>
                            <simple>${headers.message_type} == "ORM"</simple>
                            <setHeader name="entity_type"><constant>order</constant></setHeader>

                <otherwise>

                </otherwise>
            </choice>
            <unmarshal><json/></unmarshal>
            <process ref="entityGenerator"/>
            <to uri="mock:store"/>
        
    <to uri="log:entity_creation"/>
</route><route id="3a765275-15dc-4046-b199-8e8343921c8a" group=""><description>Wire Tap</description>
    <from uri="direct:3a765275-15dc-4046-b199-8e8343921c8a"/>
        <wireTap uri="direct:f69bf69e-66a4-4570-b6cd-1b3241ea4f07"/>
    <to uri="direct:255377ac-d502-475a-b820-1c921fb39d12" />
